Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress/Independance
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Hamlin and Congress near Congress/Independence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Hamlin and Congress due to, fire department activity near Congress/Independence.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
